title: Federal Student Aid Handbook
intro: The FSA Handbook is a centralized information hub providing information for how work is done across the FSA technology ecosystem.

sections.name: About
sections.description: Learn about this project, its purpose, and how it leverages modern web standards and accessibility best practices to help you build accessible, user-friendly government websites.

sections.name: Getting Started
sections.description: Everything you need to begin building with this starter site, from installation to deployment and content management.
